title: Trainwreck - Boy Night Out [GAPLESS MP3]
description:
Trainwreck is the second full-length album from the emo/post-hardcore band Boys Night Out. It is a tightly-knit concept album that follows the loss of sanity of one man following the murder of his wife he committed in his sleep.
